description: ICS techniques used by NotPetya, ATT&CK software S0368 (v2.0)
name: NotPetya (S0368)

techniques.comment: [NotPetya](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0368) initially infected IT networks, but by means of an exploit (particularly the SMBv1-targeting MS17-010 vulnerability) spread to industrial networks. (Citation: Joe Slowik April 2019)
[NotPetya](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0368) can move laterally through industrial networks by means of the SMB service. (Citation: Joe Slowik April 2019)

[NotPetya](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0368) disrupted manufacturing facilities supplying vaccines, resulting in a halt of production and the inability to meet demand for specific vaccines. (Citation: David Voreacos, Katherine Chinglinsky, Riley Griffin December 2019)
